name: @moonmoonbrothers/flutterjs
description: this is svg framework(virtual dom, state management, even calculation of layout)

scripts.package: cp package.json package/package.json && cd package && cp index.mjs index.js && npm pkg delete main && npm pkg set types='./index.d.ts' && npm pkg set type='module' &&  npm pkg set exports='{".":  "./index.js"}' --json
